website_summaries.verdict: Anyone who's in the market for a high-quality mattress with ample support will appreciate the cooling technology of this mattress.
pros: A top choice for its multi-layered foam, which offers plenty of therapeutic support while keeping you cool all night
Available in firm or soft models
cons: Price point is higher than most, but if you're a hot sleeper and demand the best, this is for you

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Update: This lasted just shy of 3 yrs. Looking for a new memory foam mattress. This one finally failed. The support is gone. Starts out fine ,but like any other mattress my hips and shoulders are in pain when I wake. The hubby complains too. There is the dreaded hump forming in the middle. So this is an honest update. We basically are laying on the density foam within an hour of falling asleep. HARD on joints. So beware long term. Most of these reviews are for the first few months, but I felt like doing an update on someone who has slept in this for a few years. Disappointed, thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: daisey dukes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I waited for several hours, but it still looks like this. I'm so disappointed with the mattress and requested a replacement. But the thing is, once you open the box, you will never able to put the mattress back to it. And UPS refused to take it unless you can vacuum it and put it into a box again(Which is not possible at all). So I contacted the Amazon customer service, I'm glad that they allowed me to keep this defeated mattress so I don't waste money on this thing... Overall, I'm very unhappy with this mattress... The Replacement works very well so I change my score as 4 star. The new one reached 13 inches after only 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: 2 months is all your gonna get, then pain, pain, pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 months before things went downhill. I liked it for the first month and the second month seemed good. Then I started to get back pain a few nights a week, then it got worse and worse. Now you lay in it and your middle section falls 4 inches immediately and then hits like a rock. A horrible experience. Avoid avoid avoid this bed. It was so bad
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT HOLD up! Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this king size mattress in October of 2014 so we've had it for just over 4 years. The first two years it was amazing. Best night's sleep ever. Now it's worn out and we each have our own pockets with a hump in the middle. The hump is actually the only spot left that provides any support. The warranty is very misleading, there has to be a visible 1.5 inch depression in the mattress without anyone on it. Ours doesn't have that, but still lacks all support. I wake up with an achy back, shoulders and neck ever day. Time for a new mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: ... year now and I am still undecided if I like it or not
customer_reviews.text: I had this mattress for about a year now and I am still undecided if I like it or not. It starts quite hard and softens up a bit after a couple months and there is definitely a chemical odor with it, but not real strong and the odor was mostly gone in a month or two. This is the first foam mattress I have had and in the price range you can't find a coil spring mattress that is better than this. This is definitely not comparable to a tempur-pedic, but it should last until I can save up for one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Less longevity than a Kardashian marriage!
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on this mattress for almost 2 years it is lumpy, and hard. There is a huge ridge going down the middle of the bed between the wife and I . Our initial impression was good but time has proven to not be the friend of this thing. And be aware, the warranty requires that you pay for freight back to the manufacturer to get it "evaluated" Ever priced shipping a king sized mattress across the country? Keep in mind, it comes to you vacuum sealed in a box, about 1/4 of the actual size after you open it and it expands. Now my biggest problem is where the heck am I going to dump the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shay and Keith

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: We received this product in a box. It is wrapped pretty tightly in a plastic wrapping. It was easy to maneuver into the room and easy to open. I do like the included cover on the mattress, but I had purchased an additional Hypo allergenic cover for more protection. My wife seems to love it, but my definition of Medium Firm must differ from the company because it is not "medium firm". If anything it should be labeled "Low firm". I do like it, it just isn't the firmness I was expecting, so that's the reason I gave a 4 star rating. Yes, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Leo and Maria

customer_reviews.title: Almost 6 years later and it is still a great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our Sleep Innovation mattress in July 2014 for about $400. The classic (lowest cost) Tempurpedic mattress is about $2200. Our mattress is showing a bit of a bump in the middle but it is still amazing. And for the the price it is affordable to replace much more frequently than other options but we have not had to. We are purchasing a new one soon only because we are upgrading our guest room and this mattress is our first choice. And on a side note, the aches and pains we experienced on our prior pillow top mattress disappeared once we started sleeping on this one and it has been almost 6 years. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Telford

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this mattress for over 3 years. It gets slept on every night; it is not in a guest bedroom. It still has it's shape like it just came out of the box. No sinking or uneven places. Even the edges are still perfect. There was no odor or off-gassing from the start. The only drawback is that it can be a little hot after lying on it for a couple of hours. I find that if I sleep with only a sheet--no comforter or quilt--in the summer, it is perfect. I would not trade it for the world!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress failed after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mattress 4 years ago, when it was new. It had a good balance of firmness and comfort. About a year ago, I started to wake up with backaches. I did not associate it with a 3 year old mattress, but now, at 4 years, each side of the mattress is like sleeping in a divot, with a raised supportive ridge down the center. $550 is inexpensive for a good quality mattress, but I would not buy another Sleep Innovations product knowing there is poor long term reliability. Probably a good (though expensive) mattress for little kids or rarely used guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: amazing comfort👍👍
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd sleep innovations bed and I love them. My husband and I both suffer from back pain and we sleep like babies in this bed. Our old sleep innovation is now our guest bed. My Dad came to visit and he has always had trouble finding a mattress that works for his lower back pain. He said he didn't know he could sleep that well and was going to purchaseone for himself. Best support and comfort of any bed I've tried including the much more expensive sleep number and temperpedic.
customer_reviews.author: Em stein

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to know if you are making a good purchase or not when buying a large item online. This one will be worth it though! We previously owned an expensive pillow top mattress that caused much discomfort and was only 5 years old. We have owned this mattress for 4 months now and LOVE it. We immediately noticed a difference after the first night! My husband, who claimed had no issues with the last mattress didn't even realize how stiff and sore he was when he woke up. Not anymore! We ended up also replacing our pillows with memory foam pillows and the combination is wonderful! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy again,
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to return this mattress had I know there was only a 3 month window. I would not have purchased it. It is not comfortable and it sags already. I am not a big woman and my husband is not a big man either. It is horrible. Mattresses are the hardest to purchase without trying them out for a bit. you do not know how they are going to feel on your body in a month or so. it takes a little bit. Now I know never from Innovations
customer_reviews.author: Nina Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Great for a plush mattress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress hoping for something firm. I did not get what I wanted. The bed was very comfortable, but the softness of the mattress has lead to back pain. I only used this mattress for one month, so I cannot attest to the longevity. I do have a mattress from this seller that is several years old, which has worked well. I have reason to believe that the mattress would have lasted through 5 years. I wanted to love this, I just could not deal with the level of plush. I highly recommend this for someone who is looking for a softer sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The king size mattress was purchased for use in the master bedroom and set up early in the day. It inflated to the promised 14 inches and did not have a strong, bad odor. The odor disipated by the end of the day. We actually slept on it the first night. We were pleasantly surprised as it was like sleeping on a cloud. We ordered the soft to firm mattress. It conforms to your body removing pressure points. My 82 year old husband's arthritic back pain has lessened. I am sleeping better as I can once again sleep on my back and more soundly. I definitely recommend this mattress for someone who wants a soft to slightly firm bed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mattress at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress after a recommendation from a friend. We visited and slept in their quest room several times and absolutely loved their mattress. When we were ready to replace our 15 year old pillow top mattress, this was the first and only one we considered. It's been several months and we're still extremely happy with it. We both struggle with back pain and my partner prefers a firmer mattress while I'm happy sinking into a soft mattress. This works for both of us and that's hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I watched the videos and read the reviews before purchasing my queen size mattress. As soon as i unpackaged it, It layed flat and inflated immediately. I put on a mattress protector, sheets and blankets and climbed aboard with no wait time. First impressions.. The bed is firm, yet soft if that makes any sense. I think I'm really gonna like this bed after putting up with a mattress with worn out springs for far too long. Will write another review after sleeping on it a few nights. I have high hopes that my back pain will go away.
customer_reviews.author: steve whitman

customer_reviews.title: Four years later and the comfort is like day one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2013, and it looks and feels as it did on the day we installed it. We purchased the smooth top mattress, which still gives us that light cradling comfort and fits you like a glove. I used to wake up with lower back pain, and for the last four years I have been pain free! My husband and I sleep much better and am glad we made this purchase! I love that you get such a quality item for much lower than name brand products!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Harder than a bed of nails.
customer_reviews.text: I have never been in this much pain sleeping on this for three weeks. We received this and never got one night of good rest. My husbands back was so bad after sleeping on this, his legs and arms were going numb. I could barely walk. After a week, I called directly to the manufacturer, but they were closed. I emailed, and I got a lovely email back politely saying, "Too bad, so sad". I bought this bed because it has a 3,650 sleep guarantee. They lied.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... other back and joint issues and havent had a comfortable bed where i can sleep without tossing and turning ...
customer_reviews.text: i have osteoarthritis as well as other back and joint issues and havent had a comfortable bed where i can sleep without tossing and turning in years. i read about this bed and bought it here without ever seeing one or trying one in person. i have only had it two days and i have slept so good without tossing and without waking every 15 minutes. i love this bed and give it 100%. it is the perfect amount of firmness that my body needs but still has a wonderful level of comfort. the foam just molds to you in every way your body needs. i love this bed!!! best investment i've made in years!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: this bed is magnificent for the first 6 months. Then you start to cave into the middle. Then it becomes so hard that a stone slab would be more comfortable. Both my husband and I wake up in pain every day. He’s a back sleeper, I’m a side sleeper. This bed is so hard that it might be comfortable for stomach sleepers, or someone who has never known the comfort of sleeping on a mattress in their lifetime. It’s been 4 years and I just can’t take it anymore. The floor would give me better rest than this bed. I know my used couch sure does!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a real pain in the neck... and back...
customer_reviews.text: I wake up every day with an aching back. Many nights I have a hard time falling asleep. We have had the mattress for a couple of years, and are currently replacing it. The mattress itself feels comfortable when you first get into it, but if you are warm blooded this thing gets warm. In fact, you can't get into bed after a hot shower, as you will never cool down. This bed is probably fine for folks on a budget, but I would recommend getting at least a gel infused mattress, to at least keep you a little cooler. Hopefully my new mattress won't be such a short endeavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bivens72

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Been sleeping on this for 3 miserable years now. My back has gotten progressively more painful since we got this mattress. I thought for the first month or two of having it, it might just take some getting used to but it just has gotten worse. Don't buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Loses support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress just two years ago. It has completely lost its support. My husband and I both now have back and hip pain due to this mattress. The only section of this mattress that has retained its support is directly in the middle. We both can’t sleep there. In the beginning the mattress was great but now it’s awful. We haven’t had a good nights sleep in months from tossing and turning due to back pain. We even rotated the mattress hoping to find some relief but this did not help at all. It’s very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kistler

customer_reviews.title: 4 Years of Soreness and Bad Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why I kept this mattress so long. I bought it in July 2016 and I have never enjoyed it. I get bad should pain because I am a side sleeper. The mattress drops low along all the sides whether you sit on the edge or find yourself sleeping on the edge. Only comfortable spot is dead center, and that doesnt work when you have your spouse there and maybe some liddo kids climbing in. I sleep better on my kid's 6in memory foam mattress that cost me less than $125. Finally made the change to another mattress (Chime) and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: TheAutumnWind

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value and a great night's sleep. There are so many mattresses out on the market today it can be hard to cut through the clutter. I was lucky enough to have a friend who had previously bought this mattress so I was able to try it out. He has had his for four years and it is still great. It does soften up a little over time but it doesn't have divets in it our anything like that. Since getting mine I have been sleeping like a baby. It is firm enough for me and soft enough for my wife which is kind of incredible.
customer_reviews.author: I. Joseph Marguliath

customer_reviews.title: Mattress sinking in on one side after less than a year’s use
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is now sinking in one side after less than a year’s use. A good quality mattress should have much better support. Our previous mattress was used for over 10 years and never had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: CT_NJ

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than old expensive mattress in many ways
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had one of these, the 12" version, for over 4 years and suggested we try one because or sealy double sided pillow top mattress was starting to sag in the middle. WE love it. If either of us has to get up, the other one isn't disturbed. I have arthritis and get up feeling much better. My husband had a sciatic nerve pinch and was in bed a lot for the last 3 months. I'm sure this mattress made his life better. I added a Chili Sleep System with Chili Cool MeshTM on my side- Great for folks who run hot. Love my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gill

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a game-changer for us. Yes, it's a little harder at first until you break it in. Sure, your body might feel a little sore the first few nights until you get used to it and it's broken in. This is all true for any and all foam mattresses when converting from an old pillow-top. Now, when we travel, we can't wait to get home to our bed. We bought the queen and it was so good, when we upgraded to king last year, we bought the same one in king size. I could not be happier...especially considering the price! What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Adam Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Less comfortable than my previous Sleep Innovations Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the Shiloh 12 in Memory Foam Mattress, and it slept at least twice as well as this one does. The 14in is just too mushy. It also never "inflated" to 14 inches. Not sure if it is defective or what. Anyhow, our previous mattress lasted about 3.5 years, which is all I expected from a sub $500 mattress, and I was hoping the 14in one would be even better. Alas, I wish I would have sent this one right back and exchanged if for the 12in model. Unfortunately, this was at the beginning of the Covid pandemic and I really had other things on my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this mattress! Three years later.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress for exactly three years. The hubs is 200 pounds, I am 120 pounds. We love this bed. Nothing about its comfort has changed since the original purchase. I'm a frequent toss and turner--I rarely bother my husband with that. My gripe about coil mattresses was that I'd have a tendency to roll toward my husband due to his body weight. Not with this mattress! Currently have a queen-size. Our plan is to get the king and put the queen in our RV. Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Bell4aday

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEST Mattress we've owned
customer_reviews.text: This bed is simply AMAZING. We purchased and temperapedic mattress with a trial for 30 days. It was suppose to be firm, but it was like sleeping on the floor. We woke up in pain and got little sleep. We sent it back and order this bed. From day 1, we've slept so well, and no pain when waking in the morning. Highly recommend it. I reccomend the 14 in foam one. It provides better stability if someone is tossing and turning at night!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is what I expected. My son has the same one from a year ago so I knew what I was getting. It's a pretty firm mattress but still not uncomfortable for achy joints, etc. It dis not expand to the full 14 inches, more like 13. And the edges are softer so when you sit on the side you can kind of slide off. But honestly, this is a good mattress and worth the money spent. But don't get if you are expecting to sleep on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of firmness
customer_reviews.text: This is our third mattress of this model and brand. Other two were for other bedrooms. We have bought the full, Queen , and now king. Very happy so far after sleeping a month on our new kingside. Firm , yet not too hard for our tastes. We are in our upper 50’s and both enjoy our sleep much better than older mattress. I sleep on my back and my wife is a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D. Holton

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Queen and King sizes!
customer_reviews.text: HARD! I've had this bed for about five nights now. The first two nights, the mattress was wonderful. All of a sudden, it seems that the mattress' density has increased and it's so tough that I have back, hip, and shoulder pains because I am a side sleeper. I've read the reviews a little bit more in depth and it appears that most people have issues with Queen sizes and up. This is an issue since i'm a tall man who requires enough length so that my feet don't hang off. In any case, I will be attempting to return this mattress, as it has become an object of anathema in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress for the price, but not long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this back in September of 2011. So here's a really brief review ~6 and a half years later... constituting about 4 years of regular use. I loved this mattress when I first got it; I like a firm sleeping surface and this was just right for me. Four years of every day use later, though, I have worn a central low point in the bed and it's no where near as comfortable. ):
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I had a 2y (I bought new, Serta) old pillow top and my sleep had just went downhill. The first one of these I ordered didn't inflate properly but they sent a new one and after letting it inflate a week (I wanted to make sure the smells were out)...I've been sleeping great. Getting used to foam as a side sleeper is tough, but I'm 4 months in and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep in years
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress I have ever slept on. I know some people give it a bad rating saying it is too firm, but it really is only about personal preference. I have slept on hard beds and this is not one of them. Yes it is firm, you don't feel like you are sleeping on a soft pillow top but I don't think that is best for your back anyway. I had back surgery last year and this mattress addresses issues that no other mattress has, regarding the many issues my back requires. It take a night or two to get used to the difference but once you stick with it, you will be happy you transitioned.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased six of these!
customer_reviews.text: I see all these mattress stores and I think, "If people only knew". I suffered on a $1400 spring mattress for several years, then I bought another spring mattress that I could only take for a year before I purchased this mattress in a King size a couple of years ago. I recently bought a Full and a Queen for my kids and they loved them. Then we moved and left our old house furnished so I had two Queens and one King delivered on the day we arrived. So convenient and the best mattress, by far, that I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: By no means is this a 20 or even 10 year mattress
customer_reviews.text: This bed was ok at first. Then it was good for some time but kept getting softer and softer. Sidewalls breaking down even more. Recently both of our backs were hurting every morning. Had to get rid of it and get a better mattress in a little over 3 years. We are not overweight people and the mattress LOOKS fine but breaks down getting softer over time. By no means is this a 20 or even 10 year mattress
customer_reviews.author: S. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Ever
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this mattress (king) in September 2011 and it's January 2020, and it's still just fine. We have been very faithful with turning it every three months or so, head to foot, foot to head, so that wear has been even over the years. I am only just now thinking probably by the end of the year we will replace it ... with the same mattress. For the price and the comfort, you just can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: cab

customer_reviews.title: Review 4 years later
customer_reviews.text: This is a review 4 years later. I’ve purchased several different memory foam mattresses on amazon. This one has definitely held its own. It’s been amazing- up until now. 4 years later, it has dipped and isn’t as firm. I am still giving 4 stars for the price and the fact it has lasted this long. It’s been amazing. The mattress I had prior lasted for 2 years. So I consider this one a win. If you’re expecting it to last decades- this isn’t the mattress for you.
customer_reviews.author: lab_lover

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress, period!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress 4.5 years ago and we still LOVE it! They are the most comfortable mattresses. We love it so much that we purchased 2 more for other beds in the house. They appear to be the same wonderful quality and they feel as comfortable as our original one. The only downside is that when we travel, even when we stay in high-end hotels known for their fancy/dream beds/mattresses, they are NEVER as comfortable as these mattresses we have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Historic Fiction Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly "soft-medium", but appears to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit stiffer than one would expect from a mattress categorized as "soft-medium", but we shall see if it softens up as time goes on. We had to buy an additional pillow-top cover in order to make this mattress tolerable. It does not get too hot or cold and offers excellent support, but it is stiff unless you are a heavier person. Still seems to be of good quality construction and time will tell how it holds up - will try to return in a year to update.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Bought this back in 2015
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Pretty much sleeps like it did on day one. Firm, but soft. Don't bank too much on the warranty. I have had no interactions with them, but the way companies come and go these days, 10 years is a long A time. My only issues is that the mattress absorbs so much movement that you have to work extra hard vs on a normal spring mattress, but it makes for good cardio.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K.

customer_reviews.title: Wake Up in Pain Sleeping on this Bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress after hearing great reviews from various websites and friends. We have had a Tempur-pedic for years. We went out on a limb and bought this mattress because of the great reviews. We bought the mattress and it is NOT a medium feel mattress. It is so stiff. We toss and turn all night. Our shoulders and hips hurt all day and now we can't even sleep on the bed. I am trying to return it but do not know how to return it because how do you fit this mattress back in its original packaging.... I wish we could get support from Sleep Innovations to help us return or replace this terrible mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! Very comfortable and exactly what I was looking for. I have a low profile bed frame so wanted A 14" height mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Sflores

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY A GOOD DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for about 4 months now and we are very happy with the mattress so far. Not one single complaint at all. The firmness is just right its not soft and its not too firm either. I like a firm mattress and I wouldn't mind something a tad bit more firm so don't worry about this being too firm because its certainly not too firm but as I stated it isn't soft where you sink into it. I can't stand sinking into a mattress that would hurt my back so this has nice support! I'm about 190lbs and it has held up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: hiu

customer_reviews.title: Awful long term comfort.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of use there are huge divots where I sleep and I wake up with my back killing me every morning. I am 6’ tall, 165 lbs (female). The mattress was perfectly fine for about the first 4 to 6 months, now I am looking for a replacement .
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: after reading a good majority of the reviews we decided to go with ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been sleeping on this mattress for 4mo, and I wake up in so much pain everyday. We bought it because our old mattress was about 7years old and I have back and hip problems, after reading a good majority of the reviews we decided to go with this one. I wish it had a return policy, because now, even though it was very affordable, I still feel obligated to keep it. I guess we will try purchasing mattress topers to see if I can get some relief. I think it is WAY TOO FIRM, like sleeping on the ground. We will be hard pressed to buy another mattress on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to write this review.....this mattress bed in a box is truly the best rest/sleep I've gotten in some time. My wife also loved our first night on the mattress. Very comfortable and easy to set up although I did it by myself I would recommend help. The mattress in a box is heavy and two people is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: What can I say
customer_reviews.text: This bed is comfortable. Not too soft, not too firm BUT I've had this bed for a week and I'm already finding myself waking up in a pit I created with my body weight. I weigh 180lbs. If you're lighter than me you will probably get much more out of this bed than I do currently. But at this point I Refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get out of bed in the morning
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in. The quality is great as there is still no dimple, 5 years after I purchased it. My girlfriend tells me it's the most comfortable bed she's ever slept in. I have it on a metal slat bed and it stays cool all night long. Nocturnal activities are a bit difficult since there's no bounce, but I kind of enjoy the workout it has turned it into.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfy Supports well (even for plus individuals like my partner and I) Doesn't transfer motion Helps relieve back pain Cons: Sleeps hot, can't sleep without a fan. Overall this is a great bed. Especially for the price, it was my first time ordering a bed offline without trying it (and I was really nervous when I saw the box and it expand) but it did expand to the full 12 inches! I noticed a faint smell like others mentioned, but I think it was more from the vacuum plastic than the bed itself. It went away naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Shayracha

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I’ve slept on. I was hesitant to purchase a foam mattress but so glad I did. It arrived quickly and was ready right out of the box. I immediately felt the difference after one night of sleeping on the mattress. It contoured to my body and I did not feel my husband tossing and turning throughout the night as I usually do.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Sagged a lot after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this the first 3 years but in the fourth year, we’ve noticed sagging and my wife has been experiencing back pain. It started out very well and we were pleased for the first 3 years but then we noticed more aches and then the sagging issues. I’m going to talk with their warranty/customer service dept to see if we can get this replaced as we would like to try to see if we just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Shilol 12 inch mattress DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunely, we have had this mattress for barely 3 years. Purchased Date 5/14/16 and the mattress is already sinking on the sides and feels absolutely horrible. I even purchased the bed frame recommended Do not waste your money it does not last 20 years.. DO NOT RECommend. Do NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Too hot and creates divots over time
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress in king size for just shy of 4 years. It has been an okay mattress for me, my husband likes it a lit more than I do. About 1 year ago I put a feathered on it and that cooled it down and made it more comfy. But now I just can't get past the hole I sleep in and the basic tossing and turning. We will be buying another mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Liz from Vermont, now in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I have tested others in person I like better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, and I will say that it is a big step up from my 8 year old spring mattress, but I have been on others that I like better. The description says medium firmness, but I would say it is a little on the harder side compared to other memory foam mattresses I have tested in person. I would probably give it 3.5 starts if it allowed but I will round down because of the cost, while not a bad deal, is still nothing to scoff at. In the future I will be going to test mattresses in person before making an investment like this again.
customer_reviews.author: ofthelost

customer_reviews.title: Quality, value, great sleep
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased the queen size about 7 years ago and loved it. So when she said she wanted to upgrade to a king, I knew there was only one choice. This bed is beyond a value for its price. I recommend it to all my friends, even my in laws got in on the great sleep! Proof is in the pudding, I have and would buy this bed again
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Rest!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress blunts the movements of my husband...restless legs syndrome. Finally I get total rest! I love this mattress❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase. The biggest issue was how firm the mattress felt, but that was easily remedied with a mattress topper. Now the problem is my fitted sheet struggles to stay in place, but both the wife and I think we have one of the most comfortable beds around. Every time we travel, the main thing we look forward to getting back to sleep in our own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Smackmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 months since purchasing this mattress and it has been great! This is not my first time buying a mattress online but this is my first memory foam I’ve purchased. I was nervous to switch to a memory foam mattress but I must say I’ve been very pleased so far. This is a great mattress for the money and there has been no chemical smell or issues with it sinking in. I received it very quickly (2 days) and had no trouble setting it up/unboxing. It inflated evenly and has been consistently supportive. Please note this is a firm mattress, if you do not like a firm mattress this is probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Still love after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress over 4 years ago after testing out every mattress at the matress stores. It is just as good as the $4000 competition at a tenth of the price. It is just as firm as when we first unboxed and is barely showing signs of wear. We will purchase again IF we ever need to replace
customer_reviews.author: sashby

customer_reviews.title: Hard not Firm
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since 2014. At first the firmness was nice and I felt a little bit of "plush". But within a year, it got firmer and firmer. Not even 2 years since the purchase I had to stop using it and put it in the guest room because laying on this mattress is no different from sleeping on the floor. It's hard, not firm. I don't dare jump on it to land on my back or butt because it hurts. It has retained its shape (thus the 2 stars) but I think any mattress this hard would not easily deform or sag.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: Plan to replace in 3-4 years
customer_reviews.text: Once I loved this mattress. It took some time to get used to the firmness of a solid foam mattress, maybe 2 weeks. After that, it was wonderful. But the dents began to annoy us about 18 months ago. We turned it over. They do not go away when you turn it over. I suppose 5 years is long enough, but I think I’ll stick to box springs in the future. The mattress I had before this was 10 years old when we gave it up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Fleming

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 years later and still in love
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress in feb of 2015. We both still love it. After feeding my little one tonight I laid down and thought “I love my bed”. So I figured it was time for a review. Bed has held it shape wonderfully and show no signs of wear. Will buy another for when my kids transfer out of their cribs!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mattress. Doing the research five years ago, I concluded that this mattress represented the best value for my money. My wife wanted to but something much more expensive from a brick-and-mortar store; however, this mattress has met her every expectation. She now loves this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: 2 YEARS+ AND STILL COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress on a whim two years ago because I was fed up with the discomfort of my old mattress. Best splurge I've ever made! I wouldn't call this a mattress, it's more of a giant pillow that holds your contours well. I sleep in every position and have had no issue regarding this mattress. Do yourself a favor and stop shopping around and second guessing yourself. BUY THIS MATTRESS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Bed investment of my marriage
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: About two years into having this bed and I still think it is a great bed. No body indents, still feels like new, and still feels comfortable. I'm sure there are nicer beds but I'm not willing to put 1,000s into it. This bed is a great deal. I currently have the queen and will buy the same bed in king when I get a bigger house. This is an amazing bed! I have had the bed over a year and it is so comfortable. I was sleeping on an older bed before but I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one of these in the future for another room of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Yes the price is great on this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled. Yes the price is great on this mattress.. the experience in the long term is terrible! When you first set up the mattress and lay down on it you will feel how firm or hard the surface is.. oh but don't you worry, after a couple months the hardness of the mattress will fade away and if you're lucky enough to give a year or so of use you'll find yourself with terrible back pain in the mornings. This mattress caves-in in the middle leaving you with terrible back pain. Skip this one. Look for an alternative. Do research. I was unfortunate and read the good reviews only..don't make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and value too
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress and a great value too. Very comfortable and relieves pressure points of a conventional mattress we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C

customer_reviews.title: Expanded fast. Comfy but supportive. Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Opened it(get help bringing up stairs!!), and it immediately started expanding. It is surprisingly comfortable pretty much right out of the box with almost no smell unless you put your face in it. We have some ridiculous 18” temperpedic and from a few minutes I’d be happy swapping. 4 stars until we see how it does with guests next week. But for now, very pleased. So far at 11.5” after 2 hours. Pic 2 hours after opening. ** has been awesome. Took the place of our 6k temperpedic. Buying another!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry folks...it doesn't work for me. Probably my fault. Never had a solid foam mattress...thought I'd try it out...slept "pretty good" for about a month...then the "sag" began. I'm about 220 lbs. Would try sleeping on the side of the mattress, but seemed to "slide" toward the middle. Slept, (or tried to sleep) on it for 6 months...restless nights, backaches,from sleeping in a ditch became too much. Went back to springs.
customer_reviews.author: jonesjunk

customer_reviews.title: it becomes quite comfortable. It is semy hard
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit complicated to get used to it but once you have, it becomes quite comfortable. It is semy hard, it is not as hard as a spring equivalent so if you like too much support this is not for you. The package is quite heavy so be careful and try use a dolly to get it in your house or appartment in case the delivery guys don't leave it where you need it exactly. It takes a while to totally unfold so be patient and it will perfectly become flat in several hours in my case it took until the next morning and yes my wife and I slept on it the first night.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: The mattress was in good condition when delivered (considering shipping left the product on ...
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was in good condition when delivered (considering shipping left the product on wrong level and was opened a bit by neighbors). For the most part it was as page description says. It is comfortable, firm and sturdy and is good quality for the price. I sleep very well and am satisfied with no issues for the product. Delivery was not the best, it weighs about 100-150lbs? and I live on the second level so it was left downstairs and had to bring it up.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love our mattress! We have had it for a year and a half and it is still the most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept on. The mattress cover is kind of a pain to remove for washing and even worse to replace, but that is the only negative! You will definitely need sheet holders though, I have yet to find a sheet that can fit this mattress well enough not to have corners popping up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: This mattress does not inflate to 14”
customer_reviews.text: This mattress doesn’t not inflate to 14” as specified. The most i got out of this mattress is 12. 6”. I gave it a week to see if it would inflated any further to my disappointment it did not. The mattress has the right firmness feeling I was looking for however the thickness of the mattress was the main reason I decided to buy this particular mattress ( I was replacing the 12” foam mattress i had) hence i give it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first memory foam mattress, & I don't think I could go back to springs. My back feels so much better than with my old mattress. It takes a few nights to adjust, but it's worth it. A few notes: once expanded fully, the full size mattress is a bit wider (1.5-2") than my full size box spring. My frame is custom, so I was able to adjust it (adding a shortened & ripped 2x10 on end beside the box) to account for this, but this could be a problem if you have a factory frame. Also... doing naughty things on this mattress... much more difficult. This bed is great for sleeping & lounging. Not for activity.
customer_reviews.author: Cray

customer_reviews.title: Was good only for an year
customer_reviews.text: A good quality mattress should last for at least 5 years. I bought this mattress 4 years ago, but after the first year it started sagging at the center. I kept rotating the mattress every few months, but now entire midline of the mattress is drooped low, and now I got sciatica two times. Definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sumanth P

customer_reviews.title: I feel good again!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting old but it was just my box spring. This foam mattress has made such an impact! It feels a little hot now that is summer but we've just slept without blankets and been fine. Accomidates two big & tall adults with tons of room to spare. Held up to extra activities just fine. Shipped fast, set up/ expanded instantly. Didn't have much of any smell. I let it air out until bedtime just in case but have not noticed any fumes or oders. Absolutely would buy again, especially for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Four years in, mattress is doing great. Definitely on the firmer side. Sleeps a little warm as well. Great value. Strong odor when we unboxed it, but after following instructions for airing it out, there was no noticeable smell. Wouldn't plan to sleep on it the first night though. Survived three moves and two pets inside of a mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the matress at first. Then after about the second year it formed a sink hole and became uncomfortable. Not sure how long it should last but seems short for me.
customer_reviews.author: d. schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: After just two years of use this mattress has sagged and become lumpy. I am 5’10” 175 lbs. My hips and back pain have returned.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Message to POSITIVE Reviewers of this Mattress...Thanks for Nothing!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware Something extremely fishy regarding all the positive and over-the-top reviews. Be skeptical before spending your hard earned money. We do not recommend this mattress. We wanted to like the product but we're very disappointed that it's way too hard and very uncomfortable. Even if you prefer firm mattresses, we doubt you'll be happy. The reviews are extremely misleading IMHO. Don't make the same mistake I did. I'm now stuck with this thing thanks to all the questionable reviews I read. To those who wrote those reviews, thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Calabogie

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress really delivered. I am very satisfied with this purchase. I was about to buy a mattress which was twice the price of this one. I ended up buying this mattress and couldn’t have been happier with my decision. Still going strong after many years
customer_reviews.author: olgac

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad we did
customer_reviews.text: I had friends warn me about buying online, and about how frustrating it is to roll these things back up to ship back (they're vacuum sealed), but we decided to roll the dice. I'm really glad we did! This is hands down the best mattress we've owned. I would describe the texture as a medium-firm memory foam. It was easy to unpack and roll out onto the bed and we've not even had to think about sending it back. Would recommend it for anyone who needs a firmer mattress, particularly for back pain, but doesn't want to go completely firm.
customer_reviews.author: jonm

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed for 8 years and it's still in great shape. Comfortable, great value and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what it’s supposed to be...
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this mattress and are pretty happy with the firmness and quality of it. Sleep is good and very comfortable. However, it has not expanded to be the full 14 inches it says it should be. We have about 13 inches currently and it’s been over a week of it being unboxed.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: this mattress has been great. It gets a little warm in the summer ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price, this mattress has been great. It gets a little warm in the summer but with the recent chilly months i find myself staying pretty warm and comfortable. The edges don't offer any support (in fact putting all of your weight in one spot like your knee or one plam is pretty uncomfortable to try and support yourself with, but that is any mattress without any rigid support.) Didn't really notice any out of the ordinary smells. It arrived in a tight packaging within another box, took a day to 'inflate' tldr: happy with this mattress, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: they have a king and love it. She thought the king was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a queen for our new guest bedroom on the recommendation of our daughter, they have a king and love it. She thought the king was a little firm, so got a thick pad, but it's perfect for her husband. They have slept on our queen and she says it is a little less firm and is great, he can't tell the difference. I loved that it arrived at our door and easily transported (by someone who can lift more weight than I can) up the stairs and around a corner before unpackaged and "inflated" to it's full size.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: ... a new bed and I found this one with great reviews on here
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a new bed and I found this one with great reviews on here. It had a slight chemical smell for maybe 2-3 days, but other than that, it's exactly what we were looking for. It is really, really firm. My husband loves firm beds, me not so much. We decided that it was better to get a firm that can be padded with feather mattress toppers for me, rather than a bed that was too soft and unable to be firmed up. We got a King because our queen was too small for little kiddies who come creeping into our bed late at night. The bed is great and the price was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Eversawsol3

customer_reviews.title: the first night was great..
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn....the first night was great...very firm but cradling with the memory foam. Second day I woke up with a back ache as I felt like I was in a sink hole...day three was better...stayed pretty firm all night....my room temperature was at a constant 65 degrees so I am not sure why it fluctuated so much...It felt hot to sleep on at times even with cotton sheets...I am returning and trying a different mattress...These reviews are tough since everyone is different...If the new mattress from a different vendor isn't better, I may end up re-ordering this one again as it wasn't terrible...
customer_reviews.author: Red White & Blue

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down before 20 years
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was a good option for us when budget was limited however, after five years the mattress sinks considerably resulting in joint problems. After reviewing the warranty, I see that the customer has to pay to have the mattress shipped to Sleep Innovations for inspection. I imagine the cost of shipping is significant. Buyer beware--don't expect this mattress to last 20 years. It may be a good option for a few years if your budget is limited and you need the convenience of a mattress shipped to you directly.
customer_reviews.author: David Gaebler

customer_reviews.title: A God send !!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and settled on this mattress. My husband is a large man and his back was suffering from our old spring mattress. The order arrived within three days and the first night my husband slept through without any pain or discomfort. We found the bed to be not only firm but very supportive. The integrity of the material is without question remarkable. When my husband gets out of bed its as if he was never in bed. No indication at all. He has said several times best mattress he has slept on in his forty years. Great product and the price spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: In love with this mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: FIrm... Exactly what we were looking for.. Our last mattress was a pillow top and 5 years old... pretty much a trampoline.. you lay down and sink right in.. feel every movement your spouse makes... UGGGG annoying.. We have had this about a month and I still am getting used to laying down in this and not bouncing around... Me and my husband both sleep great on this!!! let it expand for aprox 24 hours before using.. there was a smell there.. the first 24 hours it was pretty strong... the first night i could smell it pretty strongly ( but that could of been my strong preggo smell working) it slowly faded away... So glad we purchased this mattress...
customer_reviews.author: onecutepugdickey

customer_reviews.title: its just as good as my very expensive beauty rest mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this mattress for over 1 year and love it. I bought this as a toddler bed when we were transitioning my son from the crib to a bed. This bed is tall enough that you don't need a frame for it. For the time being, we have the mattress on the floor with no frame and don't have to worry if my son falls off the bed. The bed is comfortable for him and adults. I often find myself sleeping in this bed as my son sometimes needs dad with him to go back to sleep. I love this bed and its just as good as my very expensive beauty rest mattress.
customer_reviews.author: I bought this

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed! Excellent quality! Firm but not so firm that you feel like your sleeping on a cement slab, it has just the right amount of give no matter if your 130lbs like me or 250 lbs like my husband. Would highly recommend. And you can not beat the price, it compares to our $2000+ mattress at home. I just wish they would ship to Alaska to our main home.
customer_reviews.author: L Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very great sleep with this mattress (if you like to sleep on your back)
customer_reviews.text: I think I figured out why there are a few bad reviews. My sister and bro in law also got this exact same mattress but if you sleep on your slide it's not so great, we've discovered. I sleep on my back, and it's the best mattress ever! It's firm but also conforms to your body. I totally dig it and am getting some of the best sleep ever!! I was also pleased with the frame that I used to pair this mattress. It makes for a killer bed for around $550 (queen size). Here is the platform frame that I used to pair it:
customer_reviews.author: J. brother

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bed. No problems there. However, it's advertised as medium/soft. When your body weight is spread out while laying flat on the bed there is no give. It's like laying on a board. I was hoping it would get softer with time but so far no such luck. I've been on other memory foam mattresses that let me sink right in and take pressure off. This is not the case with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Clibon
